name: super mecha lifter 4000
description:
you are the pilot of Oo super mecha lifter 4000 oO

lift those crates and throw them to the target positions, so they can be processed! avoid the evil drills, you can sustain 2 drill attacks.

controls: 

space to pickup crates and throw them

left and right arrows to turn, up arrow to move forward.

6 levels for your pleasure in compo version . move those crates to target positions !  ^_^
